name: collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<collections::btree::node::marker::Dying, K, V, Type>::as_leaf_dying

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<Borr.doc:
Exposes the leaf portion of any leaf or internal node.

 Returns a raw ptr to avoid invalidating other references to this node.

doc: Borrows exclusive access to the leaf portion of a dying leaf or internal node.
